3195d260-f8cd-4d92-8ecb-374238283848.name: NS7 Wireless Wearable TV Speaker
about_us: Enjoy wireless personalized home theater audio
Surround yourself in audio with Sony’s 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer technology1
Enjoy crystal clear sound with upward-facing X-Balanced speaker unit and passive radiator
Connect to your devices with a stable Bluetooth connection2
Enjoy personalized home theater sound for up to 12 hours on a single charge3
Comfortable design for long listening sessions

Application.COMPATIBLE SMARTPHONE APPS: Music Center, Headphone Connect, 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer

All features: Designed with the environment in mind

Sony is committed not only to offering products, services and content that deliver exciting experiences but also to working towards our goal of a zero environmental footprint throughout our business activities.
No need to worry about battery life when binge watching. With up to 12 hours of power3 and up to 5 hours at maximum volume, the longest movies and TV shows just keep on playing.
If you do run low in the middle of a show, a 10-minute quick charging with USB type-C gives you up to an hour of extra play time.3
No need to worry about battery life when binge watching. With up to 12 hours of power3 and up to 5 hours at maximum volume, the longest movies and TV shows just keep on playing.
If you do run low in the middle of a show, a 10-minute quick charging with USB type-C gives you up to an hour of extra play time.3
Your wearable personal theater: Tailor your Dolby Atmos® experience in combination with SRS-NS7 and BRAVIA XR™ and enjoy 360 Spatial Sound.1 This wireless neckband speaker creates atmospheric personal cinema that surrounds you for a whole new way of listening.
360 Spatial Sound that adapts to your ea: The world’s first Dolby Atmos® compatible wireless neckband speaker with Sony’s BRAVIA XR models. See how immersive 360 Spatial Sound can be when you watch Dolby Atmos® movies through our latest BRAVIA XR TVs with an unrivalled range of sound features.1
Lose yourself in the scene: 360 Spatial Sound PersonalizerAnalysing the shape of your ears, your Sony headphones work with the WLA-NS7 to create the ideal arrangement of phantom Dolby Atmos speakers all around you. Be immersed in the scene and feel right at the heart of the action.1
A personal cinematic experience, just fo: With the Sony | 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer app4, you’ll enjoy a sound experience that’s optimized for you. The app captures and analyses your ear shape, then creates your own personal spatial sound field when paired with BRAVIA XR TVs and selected Sony headphones.
Connect: Connect the WLA-NS7 wireless transmitter to your BRAVIA XR TV with an optical cable and USB cable.
Pair: Pair your Sony headphones with the wireless transmitter over a Bluetooth® connection.2
Personalize: Capture your ear shape using the Sony | 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer app4 and enjoy a personalized sound experience.1
Feel the atmosphere of the arena: 360 Reality Audio4With 360 Reality Audio, music has never felt so real. Open a compatible music service on your smartphone and be fully immersed like you’re right there at the concert.
Thrilling sound, all around you: Crystal clear acoustics and powerful sound pressure combine for a richer, deeper, more rewarding listening experience.
X-Balanced Speaker Unit: Connect the supplied WLA-NS7 wireless transmitter to your BRAVIA XR TV with an optical cable and USB cable.
Upward-facing speaker: Delivers clear sound directly at you without disturbing others. Be fully immersed in your movies and music, even at midnight.
Passive radiator: Increases low frequency response for clear bass sound. Hear thumping movie sound effects and deep beats.
Pictures and sound, perfectly in sync: Supplied wireless transmitterThe supplied WLA-NS7 wireless transmitter helps minimise audio delay so you can be fully immersed in Dolby Atmos movies with sound and pictures precisely matched.
Made for non-stop entertainment: With a flexible and ergonomic design that fits securely around your neck, this wearable wireless speaker provides hours of comfortable viewing of movies, TV shows and concerts.
Working from home just got easier: Hands-free calling. Clear conversations are vital for online meetings. Optimal microphone placement allows SRS-NS7 to capture and deliver your voice in excellent quality, while an X-Balanced Speaker Unit reproduces colleague's voices clearly. With echo cancelling minimising feedback, everyone on the call can hear and be heard clearly.
Multi-point connectionConnect two devices at the same time, such as your laptop and smartphone. Then if a business call comes in on your laptop while you’re listening to music on your smartphone, you can take the call with just one click of the Play/Call button on the left side of the neckband. And once the call is over, it’s back to your favourite playlist – no need to reconnect.
Cinematic sound, however small your devi: Mobile device connectionThe SRS-NS7 not only pairs with your BRAVIA XR but also with other devices such as laptops, tablets and smartphones. Enjoy your favourite movies and shows with deep, atmospheric sound, even on palm-sized devices.
IPX4 ratingThe IPX4 splash-proof design lets you enjoy favorite shows and tunes, even while doing daily chores like washing up.
Open-ear designThe open-ear style allows you to watch and listen away from your device while still being aware of what’s going on around you.
Fabric front: Fabric surface finish gives a comfortable feel that’s a pleasure to wear and own.
Silicone neckband and soft-feel rear: With its silicone finish neckband and soft-feel rear coating, this is a practical neckband speaker for everyday use and easy cleaning of dirt.
Sustainability in mind: Our products are not only designed to be stylish but also with the environment in mind. Plastic comprises less than five per cent of the packaging material for the SRS-NS7, reflecting Sony’s commitment to reducing the environmental impact of our products and practices.
